title: Enhanced AI Prompts with Roles
description: A set of 10 enhanced prompts where AI is instructed to act in a specific role and use variables to generate results.

items.title: SEO Blog Outline
items.content: Generate a structured outline for a blog post about {{topic}} targeted at {{audience}}. Act as an SEO expert and include key SEO elements like headings (H1, H2, H3), keywords, and meta description. Focus on making the outline clear, keyword-optimized, and engaging.
items.description: SEO-optimized blog outline for content writers

variables.name: topic
variables.description: The main subject of the blog post

variables.name: audience
variables.description: Target group for the blog post

items.title: Social Media Caption Generator
items.content: Create a catchy and engaging Instagram caption for a post about {{product}} aimed at {{target_audience}}. Act as a social media expert and focus on making the caption both fun and informative. Add a call to action at the end and ensure it fits within Instagramâ€™s character limits.
items.description: Social media caption for Instagram marketing

variables.name: product
variables.description: The product or service being promoted

items.title: Email Marketing Campaign Template
items.content: Generate a persuasive email marketing campaign for a new product launch, focusing on {{product_name}}. Act as an expert marketer and include persuasive copy, a limited-time offer, and clear call-to-action buttons. Ensure the tone is engaging and sales-driven.
items.description: Email marketing template for product launch

variables.name: product_name
variables.description: Name of the new product being launched

items.title: Sales Call Script
items.content: Create a persuasive sales call script for selling {{product}} to {{prospective_customer}}. Act as a seasoned sales professional and make the script concise yet persuasive, including objection-handling responses. Focus on creating a friendly, confident, and effective tone.
items.description: Sales call script for lead conversion

variables.name: prospective_customer
variables.description: The ideal customer persona for the product

items.title: Technical Troubleshooting Guide
items.content: Generate a step-by-step troubleshooting guide for fixing issues related to {{software_name}}. Act as an experienced tech support agent and include detailed instructions, common error messages, and potential solutions. Make sure to format the guide clearly and in an easy-to-follow structure.
items.description: Tech troubleshooting guide for software issues

items.title: Personalized Fitness Plan
items.content: Create a personalized fitness plan for {{name}} who wants to achieve {{goal}}. Act as a certified fitness trainer and tailor the plan based on fitness levels, age, and personal preferences. Include a weekly workout schedule, diet suggestions, and progress tracking tips.
items.description: Customized fitness plan based on individual goals

variables.name: name
variables.description: The name of the person seeking the fitness plan

variables.name: goal
variables.description: The fitness goal the person wants to achieve

items.title: Product Review Template
items.content: Generate a product review for {{product_name}}. Act as a professional reviewer and focus on providing an honest, balanced review that includes pros, cons, and comparisons to other similar products in the market.
items.description: Honest product review with pros and cons

variables.name: product_name
variables.description: The name of the product being reviewed

items.title: Customer Support Response
items.content: Generate a polite and professional response to a customer complaint about {{product}}. Act as a customer support representative and apologize for the inconvenience. Offer a solution and express willingness to help further.
items.description: Response to a customer complaint about a product

variables.name: product
variables.description: The product the complaint is about

items.title: Marketing Campaign Plan
items.content: Create a marketing campaign plan for {{campaign_name}} targeting {{audience}}. Act as a marketing strategist and provide an outline of campaign goals, strategies, tactics, and KPIs. Include digital, print, and social media components.

variables.name: campaign_name
variables.description: The name of the marketing campaign

items.title: Recipe for {{Dish}}
items.content: Generate a recipe for {{Dish}}. Act as a chef and ensure the recipe is easy to follow, includes ingredients, step-by-step cooking instructions, and serving suggestions. Focus on making the recipe clear, precise, and delicious.
items.description: Recipe creation for a specific dish

variables.name: Dish
variables.description: The name of the dish being prepared
